snippet.title: Final Fantasy Tactics - The Lion War of the Lions Public Release
snippet.description:
And here it is, the final "The Lion War" release, the much anticipated "The Lion War of the Lions"

The Lion War of the Lions built in what The Lion War has been made, but adds the War of the Lions translation to skills, events, items and much more. Now you have spell quotes but with a War of the Lions flavor, character quotes from the PSP release but on the original release, so better performance and audio quality! It also features most of the gameplay adjustments from WotL to characters like Meliadoul, Rapha, Marach and Cloud as closest to the WotL version as could be achieved! Job abilities cost increased and some spells had their CT adjusted to fit the WotL release, as long as adding Safeguard to Elmdore, Aliste and Bredmondt.

As The Lion War, the mod that aims to bring most of the War of the Lions content to the PSX version (with the exception of Luso, Onion Knight and Multiplayer items) while also bringing many additional features, making it the definitive way to play vanilla Final Fantasy Tactics. 

TLWotL is also a framework, upon which modders will be able to build their own mods eventually with all the new features and many improvements over the hood.  

In this video I go through a brief overview of what does the mod offers and some of his unique features.  

More info and download links can be found here: https://ffhacktics.com/smf/index.php?topic=12951.0
